last_episode_to_air.name: New York
last_episode_to_air.overview: Records challenged in New York include most guitars smashed in one minute; furthest pizza toss and catch; most worms eaten in 30 seconds; fastest office chair; and fastest time to run the bases. Also: the world's first-ever hearse jump.

name: Call to Greatness
overview: Following five daring team members, bound together by the same singular goal - shatter as many world records as humanly possible, regardless of if its inane, insane, or straight up ridiculous.
